item.title: Aspnet_mvc
item.description: So seems like asp.net mvc is finally popular? That’s perfect, I mean, this is how it should have been since the beginning. Let’s start with what is mvc: Mvc is to build the application as model, view and controller. What does that means? It means that the view should be only responsible for showing the interface, the data access should be in the model layer, and everything else should be done by the controller.
